reviews.text: After having had such a great experience at the Iberotel Makadi Bay Family Resort, we decided this time to travel further south in Egypt and spent our vacation at the Iberotel Samaya in Marsa Alam. We started this journey with high expectations from our previous Iberotel stay, and to put it simple, we were more than positively surprised.
reviews.title: Another great Iberotel in Egypt

reviews.text: The hotel is located at the tip of the south pensinsula of Madinat Coraya, which is about a ten minute ride from Marsa Alam airport. Mentioning that it should be noted that even though the airport is close, there is hardly any disturbance through air traffic, as this is a rather small and infrequently flown to airport, which has very nice facilities though.
reviews.title: Relaxing, beautiful beach, friendliest & happy staff.
